velinov.java.ivybus.message

Interface Message

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsMessage

    public interface Message
    Represents a message that is sent over the IVYBus. A Message is a chunk of data containing MessageFields.
    Since:
    18.04.2015
    Author:
    Vladimir Velinov

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String TAG
      the tag identifying the message in the xml documetns.
